headline.main: Where Lies The Future of Nuclear Power? --A Dialogue; Acceptance vs. Skepticism

docs.abstract: Future of nuclear power in US is discussed in interview with Floyd W Lewis, chairman of Electric Power Research Institute, and Henry Kendall, one of founders of Union of Concerned Scientists; pors; illus (L)
